# The `MCInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Instances of this class represent a single low-level machine instruction. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Instances of this class represent a single low-level machine instruction.
